title: This Portfolio
description: This is my portfolio website, built with React, TypeScript, and React Three Fiber. The 3D models were created by me using Blender and the textures were created in Photoshop.

title: Random Poetry Generator
description: An amusing random poetry generator that uses AI populated JSON databases to store lists of nouns, verbs, adjectives and template sentences. Interface built with React and TypeScript, assisted by Cursor.

title: Todo Handler
description: Todo Handler is a todo list app build with React and TypeScript, using localStorage to handle persistence.
